name: The Fisherman: A Codfish Tale
summary: Set in 1942 during World War II, experience the challenges and homesickness faced by the sailors as they navigate the Greenland Seas to fish cod. Immerse yourself in an emotional narrative with dialogues in authentic old Portuguese slang and fulfill the duties of a traditional fisherman as you unravel the tragic fate of the ship.
